item.title: Ideas
item.description: Ideas # A collection of thoughts and ideas that haven’t yet made it into actual tasks (and may never do so). cleoc (CLI) # Design Command-Line Tools People Love # Title: GopherCon 2019: Carolyn Van Slyck - Design Command-Line Tools People Love Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eMz0vni6PAw Code: https://github.com/carolynvs/emote Slides: https://carolynvanslyck.com/talk/go/cli/ Use verb-noun Avoid positional arguments unless they are all the same type (e.g. delete a b c -> fine) Add a --json flag to every command Default to human output Dates -> go humanize Use aliases to compromise between brevity and discoverability (have ‘aliases’ section in help) combine multiple commands to achieve tasks.
